gameDetails.name: Dune: Imperium â€“ Jessica of Arrakis Promo Card
gameDetails.description:
The "Jessica of Arrakis" promo card offered by DireWolf to pre-order customers of Dune Imperium (2020).

Is included in Dune Imperium Promo Pack 1

Agent ability: If you have another Bene Gesserit card in play: draw two cards.

Reveal ability: Gain one persuasion and two battle points.

This card is shuffled into the main draw deck at startup.
